name: bms-calculator-pro
description: BMS Calculator Pro - Calculatrice professionnelle de nouvelle génération par OpimaCode

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:pc && npm run build:mobile
scripts.build:web: echo 'Building web version...' && cp -r src/* dist/
scripts.build:pc: echo 'Building PC version...' && mkdir -p dist/pc && cp -r src/pc/* dist/pc/
scripts.build:mobile: echo 'Building mobile version...' && mkdir -p dist/mobile && cp -r src/mobile/* dist/mobile/
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting code...' && echo 'No linter configured yet'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Build completed. Ready for deployment!'
scripts.lighthouse: echo 'Running Lighthouse audit...' && echo 'Install Lighthouse CLI: npm i -g lighthouse'

author: OpimaCode
